Articles.Content:
A place for new players to post their first crafts. Here's mine. I just started playing not too long ago, too.

Edited June 21, 2013 by billybobsatan
The question is do you want one that went into space or blew upon the pad?
I know the first five or so I built never made it off the pad.....many families had to be informed.

My first sub orbital was successful as well as my two two stage Redstone based upon model rocket design. Those placed Jeb into a low Kerbal orbit with just enough fuel left to bring him home. The three stage Vanguard sent him to Luna. The Nova interplanetary designs have been finicky with a bug in stage 3 decoupler caused by using a Poodle engine there. That rocket blew up upon staging. Stage four survived to bring Jeb back home. Used a different rocket engine which then staged normally. Jeb is now headed for Jool and beyond.
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=145742421 This is my first de-orbit. The picture says it all. Edited June 23, 2013 by willwolvescry

The question is do you want one that went into space or blew upon the pad?

Either one.
